name: Mesel
description: Mesel is inviting you to become the protagonist and the writer of a novel at the same time. Create your own novel with your own decisions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.0 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS 250 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 3.33 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 SE Storage: 4 GB available space
